title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing a 'copy package' action in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui module of jdt.ui3, there is a strange behavior where the destination package name becomes 'xxx'. This issue can be reproduced by following the steps below:
OB: After performing the 'copy package' action, the resulting package name is 'xx' instead of the expected 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the destination package name should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Navigate to the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui module in jdt.ui3.
2. Select the desired package to be copied.
3. Choose the 'copy package' action.
4. Specify 'xxx' as the destination package name.
5. Verify that the resulting package name is 'xx'.
